Headline: Covid cases: India reports 62,224 new Covid-19 cases, 2,542 deaths in last 24 hours | India News - Times of India
Text: With the weekly positivity rate down to 4.8% between June 8-14 and restrictions being eased across states, the government has cautioned that precautions are critical to ensure that gains made so far are not lost and there is a need to identify hotspots and implement localised containment strategies.IndiaWorld
